name: Under Armour Toronto 10K
description:
Same Race. Same Community. New Streets.

The Under Armour Toronto 10K is moving to the heart of the city and taking over the downtown core. Starting and finishing at Nathan Phillips Square, this isn't just a 10K. It's a day to show up, race hard, and move together. This race is all about the streets, the pace, and the community that makes it unforgettable.

Registration is open now. See link below.

name: Eat Well Live Well Expo
description:
Toronto's largest health food event! 

Nourish to Flourish! Ready to level up your health game? This is where vibrant energy meets mindful living. Think tasty bites, killer cooking demos, wellness hacks, and all the inspo you need to eat clean and live your best life. 

Whether you're here to discover new flavors, meet cool brands, or just vibe with fellow health lovers, this is your ultimate spot for good eats and good energy. Come hungry.
